main event: A bright glowing silver object with flashing lights was reported hovering and falling over Nurenberg, Germany.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes., The object was initially observed to be hovering before moving in a northeasterly direction., Witnesses described the object as extremely bright with flashing lights., The object appeared to move straight up before falling to the northwest., There are multiple reports concerning unidentified objects in Nurenberg from different years.
